document.discussion_title: Al-Shabab Attack Kills 20 in Central Somalia
document.topic_text: In central Somalia , at least 20 people died when two suicide car bombs rocked a local government building and a nearby market in Galkayo town in Puntland region yesterday. »
document.post: In central Somalia , at least 20 people died when two suicide car bombs rocked a local government building and a nearby market in Galkayo town in Puntland region yesterday. »
